soccerbot

Class OdometryCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • soccerbot.OdometryCorrection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometryCorrection
extends java.lang.Thread
    OdometryCorrection is a Thread that runs alongside the Odometer thread to correct its reported position using the color sensor to detect black grid lines. We know that grid lines are located at various multiples of 15 and so we either adjust the x-position or the y-position reported by the odometer depending on which multiple of 15 and at what heading the the odometer currently reports.
